name: Secret Passage
description:
Explore rooms to find the secret passage. Who knows where they may lead...

Secret Passage is the result of my first Game Jam for the Extra Credits Game Jam #5. This is also the first game I have posted on itch.io

There is a lot more I would have liked to added, but ran out of time. If I get enough positive feedback I'll continue working on it. Hope you like it!
